title: Agile Evidence-Based Simulation Education for Healthcare Professional Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Patient Interaction Experience
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education using VR equipment, combining evidence-based approaches with agile methodologies for iterative learning design.

learning_goals: Perform medical emergency response procedures in a VR simulation environment with over 85% accuracy
Design patient diagnostic protocols applying Evidence-Based Medicine (EBM) principles
Practice effective communication skills in team-based medical scenarios and achieve over 90% participant satisfaction
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
